Audio.Locality: Reserva Los Besotes_Vereda Los Besotes (Cerro Los Besotes), municipio Valledupar, Cesar
Audio.Author: Bernabe Lopez-Lanus
Audio.Comments: Gutturals songs but with ECHO because a natural wall of maybe 60 m of tall was present at the site. The bird was togheter of this wall, maybe at 30 m or less. A natural sound record
